headline: John F. Kennedy Sea Trials And Dividend Could Be A Game Changer For Huntington Ingalls Industries (HII)
summary: Huntington Ingalls Industries recently announced a quarterly cash dividend of US$1.38 per share and reported that its Newport News Shipbuilding division has completed builder’s sea trials of the John F. Kennedy (CVN 79) aircraft carrier, advancing the vessel toward fleet deployment. These milestones highlight HII’s role as a key U.S. defense shipbuilder, progressing major long-cycle programs while continuing regular cash returns to shareholders. Next, we’ll examine how the successful John F...

headline: Huntington Ingalls: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: NEWPORT NEWS, Va. AP) — Huntington Ingalls Industries Inc. HII) on Thursday reported fourth-quarter earnings of $159 million.

content.title: Huntington Ingalls: Q4 Earnings Snapshot

headline: HII Reports Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2025 Results
summary: 2025 revenue increased 8.2% to $12.5 billion2025 diluted earnings per share increased 10.2% to $15.39Achieved critical shipbuilding milestones in 2025, including delivery of Virginia-class submarine Massachusetts (SSN 798) and guided missile destroyer Ted Stevens (DDG 128)Invested over $400 million in capital improvements in 2025Achieved ~14% shipbuilding throughput growth in 2025, targeting ~15% growth in 2026 NEWPORT NEWS, Va., Feb. 05, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- HII (NYSE:HII) reported fourth q
